title: The Essex Serpent unwritten sheet of paper

content.question: The metaphor in the first paragraph comparing the narrator’s situation to a “high-wire act” emphasizes which of the following?

choices.label: The danger of the narrator’s current predicament
The narrator’s complete lack of fear
The narrator’s sense that he is being watched
The narrator’s physical agility and skill

content.answer: The danger of the narrator’s current predicament

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
